metadata.title: Benchmark 50×2 — Graph RAG + Quantitative RAG Evaluation
metadata.note: Questions matched to actual seeded data in Neo4j (entities) and Supabase (financials)

questions.question: What was TechVision Inc's total revenue in fiscal year 2023?
questions.expected_detail: Revenue lookup (data varies, check non-empty)

questions.question: What was GreenEnergy Corp's net income in 2023?
questions.expected_detail: Net income lookup (data varies, check non-empty)

questions.question: What was the revenue of HealthPlus Labs in Q4 2023?
questions.expected_detail: Q4 revenue lookup (data varies, check non-empty)

questions.question: Compare the gross profit of TechVision Inc and GreenEnergy Corp in FY 2023
questions.expected_detail: Comparison query (check non-empty response)

questions.question: What was TechVision Inc's R&D spending in 2023?
questions.expected_detail: R&D expenses may be null in current data

questions.expected_detail: EPS lookup (data varies, check non-empty)

questions.expected_detail: Cash lookup (data varies, check non-empty)

questions.expected_detail: Total assets (actual value from Supabase)

questions.expected_detail: Q3 operating income (data varies, check non-empty)

questions.question: What was the revenue growth of TechVision Inc from 2020 to 2023?
questions.expected_detail: From $4.25B to $6.745B, approximately 58.7% growth

questions.question: Which company had the highest revenue in fiscal year 2023?
questions.expected_detail: TechVision Inc with $6.745B, followed by GreenEnergy Corp $3.65B

questions.question: What was the total long-term debt for GreenEnergy Corp at end of 2023?
How many active employees does TechVision have?
questions.expected_detail: 47 active employees (3 inactive)

questions.question: What is the average salary of Engineering employees at TechVision?
questions.expected_detail: Average of Engineering department salaries (verified: $172,000)

questions.question: How many products does GreenEnergy Corp have in its catalog?
questions.expected_detail: 6 products: SolarMax 400W, SolarMax 600W, WindTurbo 5kW, PowerVault 10kWh, PowerVault 20kWh, GridManager Pro

questions.question: What was the cost of goods sold for TechVision Inc in FY 2022?
What was the tax expense for GreenEnergy Corp in Q2 2023?
What was HealthPlus Labs' revenue in 2020?
Compare the operating expenses of all three companies in 2023
questions.expected_detail: TechVision Inc $2.563B, GreenEnergy Corp $876M, HealthPlus Labs $380.16M

questions.question: What was TechVision Inc's basic EPS in Q1 2023?
What is the list price of the VisionAI Platform product?
What was TechVision Inc's total revenue across all quarters in 2023?
What was the accounts receivable for TechVision Inc at end of 2022?
How many employees are in the Sales department across all companies?
questions.expected_detail: Count of employees where department = 'Sales' (verified: 21)

questions.question: What was GreenEnergy Corp's revenue in 2021?
What was the interest expense for TechVision Inc in FY 2023?
Which company had the highest net income growth from 2020 to 2023?
questions.expected_detail: HealthPlus grew from $4.3M to $174.5M (4000%+), vs TechVision 97%, GreenEnergy 329%

questions.question: What was the total current assets for GreenEnergy Corp at end of 2023?
What was HealthPlus Labs' operating income in Q2 2023?
What was the selling, general and administrative expense for TechVision Inc in 2023?
How many shares outstanding does GreenEnergy Corp have?
What products does HealthPlus Labs sell in the Diagnostics category?
questions.expected_detail: GenomeScan 1.0 ($899.99) and GenomeScan 2.0 ($749.99)

questions.question: What was TechVision Inc's gross profit margin in FY 2023?
questions.expected_detail: Gross profit $4.587B / Revenue $6.745B = 68%

questions.question: What was the total revenue for all companies combined in fiscal year 2023?
questions.expected_detail: TechVision $6.745B + GreenEnergy $3.65B + HealthPlus $1.152B = $11.547B

questions.question: What is the goodwill on TechVision Inc's balance sheet at end of 2023?
What was GreenEnergy Corp's Q1 2023 revenue?
Which quarter had the highest revenue for TechVision Inc in 2023?
What was HealthPlus Labs' income before tax in FY 2023?
What was the retained earnings for TechVision Inc at end of 2023?
How many departments exist at TechVision?
questions.expected_detail: Engineering, Sales, Marketing, Finance, Operations, HR, Product, Research

questions.question: What was GreenEnergy Corp's operating income in 2022?
What is the unit cost of the PowerVault 20kWh battery storage product?
What was the total liabilities for HealthPlus Labs at end of 2022?
What was TechVision Inc's revenue per quarter trend in 2023?
questions.expected_detail: Increasing trend: Q1 $1.55B → Q2 $1.62B → Q3 $1.72B → Q4 $1.85B

questions.question: What was HealthPlus Labs' revenue growth rate from 2022 to 2023?
questions.expected_detail: From $768M to $1.152B = 50% growth

questions.question: What was the property, plant and equipment value for GreenEnergy Corp at end of 2023?
Which company spent the most on research and development in 2023?
questions.expected_detail: TechVision $1.349B > GreenEnergy $365M > HealthPlus $288M

questions.question: What was GreenEnergy Corp's basic EPS in fiscal year 2022?
What was the total short-term debt across all companies at end of 2023?
questions.expected_detail: TechVision $120M + GreenEnergy $80M + HealthPlus $20M = $220M

questions.question: What is the relationship between Marie Curie and the Nobel Prize?
questions.expected_answer: Marie Curie won Nobel Prizes in Physics and Chemistry, connected to Nobel Foundation
questions.expected_detail: Marie Curie is connected to the Nobel Foundation. She pioneered radioactivity research.

questions.question: Who created the Theory of Relativity?
questions.expected_detail: Albert Einstein created the Theory of Relativity (A_CREE relationship)

questions.question: What did Alexander Fleming discover?
questions.expected_detail: Alexander Fleming created/discovered Penicillin (A_CREE relationship)

questions.question: Which disease does Penicillin protect against?
questions.expected_detail: Penicillin protects against Tuberculosis (PROTEGE_CONTRE relationship)

questions.question: Where did Alan Turing study?
questions.expected_detail: Alan Turing studied at Cambridge (ETUDIE relationship)

questions.question: What is the connection between Nikola Tesla and Thomas Edison?
questions.expected_detail: Tesla and Edison rivalry over electricity (AC vs DC)

questions.question: Which scientists are connected to the University of Cambridge?
questions.expected_detail: Newton, Darwin, and Turing all connected to Cambridge

questions.question: What is the World Wide Web and where was it created?
questions.expected_detail: The World Wide Web was created at CERN

questions.question: Which organizations use Artificial Intelligence?
questions.expected_detail: Organizations using AI (check non-empty response)

questions.question: What city is the Louvre Museum located in?
questions.expected_detail: The Louvre Museum is connected to Paris (CONNECTE)

questions.question: Who developed vaccination?
questions.expected_detail: Louis Pasteur created Vaccination (A_CREE relationship)

questions.question: What diseases does the World Health Organization study?
questions.expected_detail: WHO studies COVID-19 and Malaria (ETUDIE relationships)

questions.question: What is the relationship between NASA and Nuclear Energy?
questions.expected_detail: NASA UTILISE Nuclear Energy for deep space missions

questions.question: Which city is connected to Napoleon Bonaparte?
questions.expected_detail: Napoleon Bonaparte is connected to Paris (CONNECTE)

questions.question: What is the link between Google and Stanford University?
questions.expected_answer: Google is connected to Stanford University
questions.expected_detail: Google CONNECTE Stanford University

questions.question: Where was Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart born?
questions.expected_detail: Mozart is connected to Salzburg (CONNECTE) and Vienna

questions.question: What is the connection between vaccination and COVID-19?
questions.expected_detail: Vaccination PROTEGE_CONTRE COVID-19, and COVID-19 VISE_A_LIMITER via Vaccination

questions.question: Who are the Nobel Prize laureates in the knowledge graph?
questions.expected_answer: Albert Einstein, Marie Curie, Nelson Mandela
questions.expected_detail: Einstein, Curie, and Mandela are all connected to the Nobel Foundation

questions.question: What is Ada Lovelace known for and where was she based?
questions.expected_answer: First computer programmer, based in London
questions.expected_detail: Ada Lovelace connected to London and Artificial Intelligence

questions.question: Which museums are located in London?
questions.expected_detail: The British Museum is connected to London (CONNECTE)

questions.question: What is the relationship between CERN and Nuclear Energy?
questions.expected_detail: CERN ETUDIE Nuclear Energy

questions.question: Which political leaders are connected to Washington D.C.?
questions.expected_detail: FDR and Lincoln both connected to Washington D.C.

questions.question: What did Charles Darwin study and where?
questions.expected_answer: Studied at University of Cambridge, member of Royal Society
questions.expected_detail: Darwin ETUDIE University of Cambridge, connected to Royal Society and London

questions.question: What is the connection between Leonardo da Vinci and the Louvre Museum?
questions.expected_answer: Leonardo da Vinci's works are at the Louvre Museum
questions.expected_detail: Leonardo da Vinci CONNECTE Louvre Museum, both connected to Florence and Paris

questions.question: Which universities study Artificial Intelligence?
questions.expected_detail: MIT and Stanford both ETUDIE Artificial Intelligence

questions.question: Who is connected to the city of Princeton?
questions.expected_detail: Albert Einstein CONNECTE Princeton

questions.question: What technology preceded the Internet?
questions.expected_detail: Electricity and Telephone are both connected to Internet (CONNECTE)

questions.question: What is the relationship between Mahatma Gandhi and London?
questions.expected_detail: Mahatma Gandhi ETUDIE London

questions.question: Which film directors are connected to New York City?
questions.expected_detail: Spielberg and Scorsese both CONNECTE New York City

questions.question: What is the connection between the World Health Organization and the United Nations?
questions.expected_answer: WHO is a subset of the United Nations
questions.expected_detail: WHO SOUS_ENSEMBLE_DE United Nations

questions.question: What did Marie Curie study?
questions.expected_detail: Marie Curie ETUDIE Cancer

questions.question: Which entities are connected to the city of Paris?
questions.expected_answer: Marie Curie, Louis Pasteur, Napoleon Bonaparte, European Space Agency, Pablo Picasso, Vincent van Gogh, Louvre Museum
questions.expected_detail: Multiple entities connected to Paris via CONNECTE

questions.question: What is the path from Albert Einstein to the University of Cambridge?
questions.expected_answer: Einstein → Princeton/Nobel Foundation, connected via Royal Society or other intermediate nodes
questions.expected_detail: Multi-hop path through shared connections

questions.question: What are the connections between Thomas Edison and electricity?
questions.expected_detail: Thomas Edison UTILISE Electricity

questions.question: Which scientists or inventors are connected to New York City?
questions.expected_detail: Tesla and Edison both CONNECTE New York City

questions.question: What is William Shakespeare's connection to London?
questions.expected_detail: William Shakespeare CONNECTE London

questions.question: What technology did Alan Turing contribute to?
questions.expected_detail: Alan Turing A_CREE Artificial Intelligence

questions.question: What is the relationship between Winston Churchill and Franklin D. Roosevelt?
questions.expected_answer: They are connected, both WWII leaders
questions.expected_detail: Churchill CONNECTE Roosevelt, Churchill in London, Roosevelt in Washington D.C.

questions.question: What is Cleopatra's connection to Cairo?
questions.expected_detail: Cleopatra CONNECTE Cairo

questions.question: Which diseases does vaccination protect against?
questions.expected_detail: Vaccination PROTEGE_CONTRE Influenza and COVID-19

questions.question: What is the connection between the Steam Engine and modern technology?
questions.expected_answer: Steam Engine is connected to Electricity, which connects to Internet and AI
questions.expected_detail: Steam Engine → Electricity → Internet → Artificial Intelligence chain

questions.question: Which person is associated with both Florence and the Louvre Museum?
questions.expected_detail: Leonardo da Vinci connected to both Florence and Louvre Museum

questions.question: What is Isaac Newton's relationship with the Royal Society?
questions.expected_answer: Isaac Newton was a member of the Royal Society
questions.expected_detail: Isaac Newton CONNECTE Royal Society

questions.question: Where is the Smithsonian Institution located?
questions.expected_detail: Smithsonian Institution CONNECTE Washington D.C.

questions.question: What is the connection between Nuclear Energy and electricity generation?
questions.expected_answer: Nuclear Energy is connected to Electricity
questions.expected_detail: Nuclear Energy CONNECTE Electricity

questions.question: Which artists worked in Paris?
questions.expected_detail: Picasso and van Gogh both CONNECTE Paris

questions.question: What is Pablo Picasso's connection to the Museo del Prado?
questions.expected_answer: Picasso has works at the Museo del Prado
questions.expected_detail: Pablo Picasso CONNECTE Museo del Prado

questions.question: What is the path between Penicillin and Louis Pasteur?
questions.expected_answer: Connected through medical discoveries: Fleming→Penicillin, Pasteur→Vaccination, both in Paris
questions.expected_detail: Multi-hop path through medical history and Paris connections

questions.question: Which film directors worked in London?
questions.expected_detail: Hitchcock and Kubrick both CONNECTE London

questions.question: What is the European Space Agency's headquarters location?
questions.expected_detail: European Space Agency CONNECTE Paris
